TC.Desc: TreeTC001 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size = 9
TreeTC002 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size less than 9
TreeTC003 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size greater than 9
TreeTC004 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size equal to 0
TreeTC006 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Reserved Field equal to 0
TreeTC008 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Reserved Field is greater than 0
TreeTC009 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when PathOffset greater than 0 and less than Actual Value
TreeTC010 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when PathOffset is equal to 0
TreeTC011 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when PathOffset is equal to Actual Value
TreeTC012 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when PathLength is greater than Correct Path Length
TreeTC013 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when PathLength is equal to 0
TreeTC015 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when PathLength is less than Actual Value
TreeTC016 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when PathLength is equal to Correct Value
TreeTC027 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Buffer(Share Component) is equal to 80 Characters.
TreeTC028 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Buffer(Share Component) is less than 80 Characters and greater than 0.
TreeTC029 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Buffer(Share Component) is greater than 80 characters.
TreeTC030 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Buffer(Share Component) is equal to unicode characters.

TreeTC031 - This test case is to verify the server behaviour when path length of Tree connect with multiple folders shared inside single shared folder is greater than 0 and less than or equal to 80 characters..
